title: Collection X by Justice Cutout Leotard
short_description: Whether your girl decides to wear our girl’s cutout leotard for practice or layered under a pair of our denim shorts for a day with her friends, she’ll be ready for wherever the day takes her. This sleeveless style is cut from a breathable stretch fabric and has a scoop neck, a cutout at the back, and full coverage brief bottom with a small logo at the hip.
